title: You’re My Love Since The Beginning - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Couple Growth   Divorce   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Late Romance   Loneliness   Love at First Sight   Marriage   Misunderstandings   Near-Death Experience   Terminal Illness   Unconditional Love
author: 花凛
description:
He pressed her against the wall, 'You want to divorce me for him? He's ten years younger than you. How can you do that?'
She smiled with reddened eyes and said, 'His sister is so much younger than you. Don't you enjoy it as well?'
He gritted his teeth, 'You can't divorce me unless I die.'
She had said the same thing, but she was really going to die soon.
In fact, I'll be with you for ten thousand years and the rest of my life. So did he.>
